title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Customized Language Learning Design Workshop Utilizing Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Based on analytical data collected from VR simulations, learners can explain at least three of their own language learning patterns.
Learners can revise learning designs at least twice using checkpoint analysis results.
Learners can provide at least one round of peer feedback based on process analysis data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
